content: That's really helpful, thank you! I'll definitely start working on my career roadmap using this framework. Meanwhile, I've been thinking about my current role as a senior software engineer and how I can make the most of it. I've been approached by a recruiter from a rival company, offering me a position as a technical lead. While the offer is tempting, I'm hesitant to leave my current company, where I've built a strong network and have a sense of belonging. Can you provide some advice on how to evaluate this opportunity and make a decision that's right for me?
